am targeting you all..."},{"lineNumber":232635,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それは正当なものとは言えないが、ね」","translatedEnglishLine":"I can't say it's justified, General Tiger's hand,"},{"lineNumber":232645,"originalJapaneseLine":"自分の両手で包み込む。","translatedEnglishLine":"and enveloped it with both of her own anyone,"},{"lineNumber":232649,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ないのかな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"I wonder if such a thing exists?\""},{"lineNumber":232650,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私はさ、おじさんが不幸になるのも嫌だよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't want you to be unhappy either...\""},{"lineNumber":232651,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……っ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くたばってる奴に敵も味方もない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "To those who are dying, there are no enemies or allies."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全員等しくあたしの患者よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone is equally my patient."
"These guys... if only it were just the two of them..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やめなさいと言ってやめる二人でもない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "These two won't stop just because I tell them to."
"Hah... it can't be helped..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはミックス専用の巨大な医療テントの中だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was inside a giant medical tent reserved exclusively for Mix.
"W-where... is this...?"
"Oh my, good morning."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: タイガー将軍が目を覚ました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: General Tiger woke up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 己の体に巻かれた包帯を忌々しげに睨む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He glared resentfully at the bandages wrapped around his body.
"Ugh... you've treated me...?"
You did as you pleased..."
"You're so arrogant even though you lost.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんたらを生かすも殺すも勝者の自由でしょーが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's the winner's choice whether to let you live or die."
"...Why did you keep me alive?"
"Because I'm a doctor."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おじさん達が死んだら私が悲しいから」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Because I'd be sad if you old men died."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これが、あんたの殺そうとした子達。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "These are the children you tried to kill.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一歩間違えれば殺していた子達よ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Children you would have killed if I had made one mistake."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これでもまだ、来るって言うなら来なさい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you still say you'll come after this, then come."
"At that time, I will be the one to kill you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王ランスは確かに脅威だけど……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Demon King Rance is certainly a threat, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これだけ会話して、今までしてきたこと見て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After all this conversation, and seeing what you've done so far,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだこの子達が脅威だと思っているの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: do you still think these kids are a threat?"
"You...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんでそれほど魔王の子に執着するわけ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Why are you so obsessed with the Demon King's children?"
"To me...
I had a wife and a daughter."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いた、と、それは過去形だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Had — that was in the past tense.
"The two of them...
Right before my eyes, at the hands of the Demon King—"
"It's a common reason...
Revenge."
"Since I am targeting you all...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは正当なものとは言えないが、ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I can't say it's justified, though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やめておきなさいよ、復讐なんて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You should give up on revenge...
That is... a trivial thing..."
If people stopped just because they were told that,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最初からやらないでしょうね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then they wouldn't have started in the first place."
"Hey, old man..."
Gently—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リセットがタイガー将軍の手を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reset took General Tiger's hand,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自分の両手で包み込む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and enveloped it with both of her own hands.
"Old man, somehow, well...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰も殺さないで幸せになる方法は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isn't there a way to be happy without killing anyone,
I wonder if such a thing exists?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私はさ、おじさんが不幸になるのも嫌だよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't want you to be unhappy either..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

Gently—

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and enveloped it with both of her own hands.
"Old man, somehow, well...

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Isn't there a way to be happy without killing anyone,
I wonder if such a thing exists?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私はさ、おじさんが不幸になるのも嫌だよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't want you to be unhappy either..."
